(SELECT USE_MONEY FROM t_cur_accountlog tcal WHERE tcal.id = MAX(tal.id))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as contrastResult FROM t_cur_account cat, t_cur_accountlog cal, t_cur_accountlog tal, rocky_member m WHERE ( ( DATE_FORMAT(cat.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND cat.`STATUS` = 0) or (ENDTIME > DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND cat.`STATUS` = -1) ) AND cat.USER_ID = cal.USER_ID AND cal.TYPE = 105 AND DATE_FORMAT(cal.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND cat.USER_ID = tal.USER_ID AND tal.ID < cal.ID AND cat.USER_ID = m.ID GROUP BY cat.USER_ID ) t WHERE t.contrastResult = 0 ) as isEnterMoney, ( SELECT CASE WHEN count(t1.USER_ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM ( SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_account WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = 0) or (ENDTIME > DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = -1) ) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_interest_detail WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') ) t2 ON t1.USER_ID = t2.USER_ID, rocky_member m WHERE t2.USER_ID IS NULL AND t1.USER_ID = m.ID ) as isUserNotHaveInterestDetial, ( SELECT CASE WHEN count(t1.USER_ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_account WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = 0) or (ENDTIME > DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = -1)) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_interest_detail WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') ) t2 ON t1.USER_ID = t2.USER_ID, rocky_member m WHERE t2.USER_ID IS NULL AND t1.USER_ID = m.ID ) as isUserNotHaveAccountLog FROM DUAL

SELECT m.USERNAME FROM (SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_account WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = 0) or (ENDTIME > DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = -1)) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_interest_detail WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') ) t2 ON t1.USER_ID = t2.USER_ID, rocky_member m WHERE t2.USER_ID IS NULL AND t1.USER_ID = m.ID

SELECT t1.USER_ID as userId, m.USERNAME as userName FROM (SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_account WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = 0) or (ENDTIME > DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND `STATUS` = -1)) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM t_cur_interest_detail WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') ) t2 ON t1.USER_ID = t2.USER_ID, rocky_member m WHERE t2.USER_ID IS NULL AND t1.USER_ID = m.ID

SELECT t1.USER_ID as userId, m.USERNAME as userName FROM t_cur_interest_detail cid, rocky_member m WHERE DATE_FORMAT(cid.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND cid.USER_ID = m.id GROUP BY cid.USER_ID HAVING count(cid.USER_ID) > 1

SELECT l.USER_ID as userId, m.USERNAME as userName FROM t_cur_accountlog l, rocky_member m WHERE l.TYPE = 105 AND DATE_FORMAT(l.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND l.USER_ID = m.ID GROUP BY l.USER_ID HAVING count(l.USER_ID) > 1

SELECT t.USER_ID as userId, t.USERNAME as userName FROM ( SELECT cat.USER_ID,m.USERNAME, CASE WHEN cal.MONEY = (cal.USE_MONEY - (SELECT USE_MONEY FROM t_cur_accountlog tcal WHERE tcal.id = MAX(tal.id))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as contrastResult FROM t_cur_account cat, t_cur_accountlog cal, t_cur_accountlog tal, rocky_member m WHERE ( ( DATE_FORMAT(cat.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND cat.`STATUS` = 0) or (ENDTIME > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND cat.`STATUS` = -1) ) AND cat.USER_ID = cal.USER_ID AND cal.TYPE = 105 AND DATE_FORMAT(cal.ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND cat.USER_ID = tal.USER_ID AND tal.ID < cal.ID AND cat.USER_ID = m.ID GROUP BY cat.USER_ID ) t WHERE t.contrastResult = 0

SELECT t.*, case WHEN sumTotal = (sumInTotal - sumOutTotal + sumAccountLogInterestTotal) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as isEqual FROM ( SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ca.TOTAL),0) FROM t_cur_account ca WHERE ca.`STATUS` = 0) as sumTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(INTEREST_TOTAL),0) FROM t_cur_account WHERE `STATUS` = 0) as sumInterestTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ci.ACCOUNT),0) FROM t_cur_account ca, t_cur_in ci WHERE ca.`STATUS` = 0 AND ca.USER_ID = ci.USER_ID) as sumInTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(co.ACCOUNT),0) FROM t_cur_account ca, t_cur_out co WHERE ca.`STATUS` = 0 AND ca.USER_ID = co.USER_ID) as sumOutTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cd.MONEY),0) FROM t_cur_account ca, t_cur_interest_detail cd WHERE ca.`STATUS` = 0 AND ca.USER_ID = cd.USER_ID) as sumInterestDetailTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tal.MONEY),0) FROM t_cur_account ca, t_cur_accountlog tal WHERE ca.`STATUS` = 0 AND ca.USER_ID = tal.user_id AND tal.type = 105) as sumAccountLogInterestTotal FROM DUAL ) t
